meanings.definition: One of four equal parts into which something is divided.
meanings.sent1: The pizza was divided into a quadrant for each of us to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The map was divided into a quadrant to show different regions.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sat on the quadrant of the cake meant for my sister's birthday.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like a quadrant, divided into four equal parts for family, friends, work, and hobbies.
meanings.sent5: The quadrant of the garden with the colorful flowers was the most beautiful.

meanings.sent1: The carpenter used a quadrant to measure the angle of the roof.
meanings.sent2: The scientist relied on the quadrant to accurately measure the angles of the stars.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student used the quadrant as a pretend telescope during class.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a quadrant, always measuring the angles of the world around her.
meanings.sent5: The quadrant in the toolbox was essential for precise angle measurements.
